pages.title: The Grand Design
pages.text: The ritual system of Anime Witchery is not a simple collection of spells - it is a comprehensive magical framework that combines ancient geometry, living runes, and celestial manifestations into a unified system of power and protection.$(br2)This system operates on multiple levels: the physical placement of components, the magical configuration of obelisk variants, the ritual activation and maintenance, and the visual and mechanical manifestations that result.$(br2)Understanding how these elements work together is the key to mastering ritual magic.

pages.title: Core Components
pages.text: $(b)The Ritual Circle:$(reset)$(br)$(obelisk)Barrier Circle$(reset) - The central focus point that channels and directs magical energy$(br)$(obelisk)Distance Glyphs$(reset) - Determine the size and shape of the ritual area$(br)$(obelisk)Obelisks$(reset) - The four wardens that define ritual type and properties$(br)$(obelisk)Chisel$(reset) - The tool that configures obelisk variants$(br2)$(b)Supporting Elements:$(reset)$(br)$(obelisk)Barrier Catalyst$(reset) - Activates the ritual circle$(br)$(obelisk)Sanctified Chalk$(reset) - Completes the circle drawing$(br)$(obelisk)Magic Chalk$(reset) - Creates the initial circle outline

pages.title: The Ritual Configuration Matrix
pages.text: Every ritual is defined by a 4x4 matrix of obelisk variants, each position carrying specific meaning:$(br2)$(obelisk)$(b)North (Ritual Type):$(reset)$(br)Variant 4: $(barrier)Barrier Mode$(reset) - Creates physical barriers$(br)Variant 5/7: $(effect)Effect Mode$(reset) - Applies status effects$(br2)$(obelisk)$(b)East (Shape/Effect):$(reset)$(br)Barrier Mode: Variant 1=Square, Variant 2=Circular$(br)Effect Mode: Variant 5=Poison, Variant 6=Regeneration$(br2)$(obelisk)$(b)South (Strength):$(reset)$(br)Variant 1-3: Controls barrier durability and effect amplifier$(br2)$(obelisk)$(b)West (Regeneration/Duration):$(reset)$(br)Variant 1-3: Controls barrier regen rate and effect duration

pages.title: Ritual Modes & Behaviors
pages.text: $(barrier)$(b)Barrier Mode$(reset) - Physical Protection:$(br)$(b)Square Barriers:$(reset) Create rectangular areas with four walls$(br)$(b)Circular Barriers:$(reset) Create cylindrical areas with smooth walls$(br)$(b)Durability System:$(reset) Barriers absorb damage and regenerate$(br)$(b)Player Control:$(reset) Whitelist system for access control$(br2)$(effect)$(b)Effect Mode$(reset) - Magical Influence:$(br)$(b)Poison Effects:$(reset) Harm denied players and non-players$(br)$(b)Regeneration Effects:$(reset) Heal allowed players$(br)$(b)Area Coverage:$(reset) Full vertical coverage from bedrock to sky$(br)$(b)Continuous Application:$(reset) Effects pulse every second

pages.title: Visual Manifestations
pages.text: Active rituals create several visual effects:$(br2)$(b)Sky Ritual:$(reset) The $(obelisk)BarrierCircleSky.png$(reset) texture manifests 70 blocks above the ritual, rotating slowly and visible from 200 blocks away$(br2)$(b)Barrier Walls:$(reset) Visible walls extend from Y=0 to Y=256, creating massive vertical structures$(br2)$(b)Animation:$(reset) All elements pulse and animate, creating living magical displays$(br2)$(b)Distance Control:$(reset) Visual effects fade beyond 200 blocks for performance optimization$(br2)The ancient texts describe these manifestations as 'The Dance of Power' - the visible expression of magical energy flowing through the ritual system.

pages.title: Ritual Lifecycle
pages.text: $(b)1. Preparation:$(reset)$(br)Draw the barrier circle, place distance glyphs, position obelisks$(br2)$(b)2. Configuration:$(reset)$(br)Use the chisel to set obelisk variants according to desired ritual$(br2)$(b)3. Activation:$(reset)$(br)Activate the circle with barrier catalyst, complete the ritual sequence$(br2)$(b)4. Validation:$(reset)$(br)System checks obelisk configuration for validity$(br2)$(b)5. Manifestation:$(reset)$(br)If valid, ritual activates and visual effects appear$(br2)$(b)6. Maintenance:$(reset)$(br)Ritual continues until integrity is broken or manually deactivated$(br2)$(b)7. Deactivation:$(reset)$(br)Ritual shuts down, obelisks return to dormant state

pages.title: Strategic Applications
pages.text: The ritual system offers numerous strategic possibilities:$(br2)$(b)Defense:$(reset) Create impenetrable barriers around bases and territory$(br)$(b)Area Control:$(reset) Use effects to create zones of influence$(br)$(b)Territory Marking:$(reset) Sky rituals clearly mark your controlled areas$(br)$(b)Alliance Support:$(reset) Create healing zones for allies and poison zones for enemies$(br)$(b)Resource Protection:$(reset) Shield valuable resources and structures$(br)$(b)Navigation:$(reset) Use sky rituals as visible landmarks$(br2)$(b)Intimidation:$(reset) Impressive visual displays can deter potential threats$(br)$(b)Flexibility:$(reset) Quickly reconfigure rituals using the chisel system

pages.title: Advanced Techniques
pages.text: Master ritualists can employ advanced techniques:$(br2)$(b)Ritual Networks:$(reset) Create multiple rituals to cover large areas$(br)$(b)Layered Defense:$(reset) Combine barriers and effects for comprehensive protection$(br)$(b)Dynamic Reconfiguration:$(reset) Use the chisel to adapt rituals to changing situations$(br)$(b)Strategic Placement:$(reset) Position rituals to maximize coverage and minimize resource cost$(br)$(b)Timing Optimization:$(reset) Activate rituals at strategic moments$(br)$(b)Maintenance Planning:$(reset) Design rituals with appropriate regeneration rates for your needs$(br2)The ancient texts speak of these techniques as 'The Art of the Warden' - advanced methods that separate novice ritualists from true masters of the craft.

pages.title: The Path Forward
pages.text: You now possess the knowledge of the complete ritual system. Study each component carefully, experiment with different configurations, and learn to read the ancient language of the stones.$(br2)Remember the words of the ancient wardens:$(br2)'Magic is not a tool to be wielded, but a language to be spoken. The stones will teach you their secrets, the circle will guide your power, and the heavens will bear witness to your craft.$(br2)Master the variants, understand the configurations, and you will become not just a user of magic, but a true warden of the ancient ways.'$(br2)Go forth and create rituals that will shape the very fabric of your world.
